ok guys, you don't need the ISO thing at all!

1. download this torrent, which will make you download GTA:San Andreas pc

2. after you download, find the folder and the readme

3. double-click on the folder "gta san andreas" (i probably missed capitals) and find "setup.exe"

4. run setup.exe, and it will install the game on your computer (takes about 15 mins) and when it asks to create a desktop shortcut, click "yes"

5. after installation is complete, go to 
my computer > c: > program files > rockstar games > gta san andreas 

6. look for the file "gta_sa.exe" and delete it

7. now, go back to the original "gta san andreas" folder in step 2.

8. open the folder "crack" and look for "gta_sa.exe"

9. copy THIS "gta_sa.exe" and paste it in the "rockstar games" folder in "my computer"

10. double-click this gta_sa.exe or go to the  desktop and double-click on the shortcut.

11. enjoy!

**THIS REQUIRES NO CD/DVD BURNER, NO ISO, OR ANY SHIT LIKE THAT. NO NEED TO MOUNT, ETC ETC ETC**

quick dl, thanx 4 the advice KENT92, worked a treat. seeding now

1. Download torrent (duh)
2. Open the folder you've downloaded
3. Click on "setup.exe"
4. Click "No" on the setup for online gameplay and "yes" for desktop icon.
5. Let it extract
6. Go back to step 2
7. Click on "crack" (Folder)
8. Copy "gta_sa.exe"
9. Go to where it extracted to (mines: C:/Program Files(x86)/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto
10. (OPTIONAL: Create a backup of "gta_sa.exe"   and replace it with what you did on step 8.
11. Enjoy playing GTA SA

to everyone who doesn't know how/where to put/use a crack file: right click on the san andreas icon after installation, hit properties then open file location, copy gta_sa in the crack folder and copy and paste it in the location that san andreas was installed (the file that popped up when you hit properties and open file location) then your done, enjoy the game :)
